personal.name: Prajwal P Amte
personal.title: Full Stack Engineer @ Fidelity Investments
personal.bio: I enjoy building scalable backend systems and developing data-driven intelligent applications. A tech enthusiast at heart, always eager to learn and adapt to new technologies.

items: Languages: Java, Python, JavaScript/TypeScript, C/C++, Rust
Version Control & CI/CD: Git, Jenkins, GitHub Actions
Frontend: React, AngularJS | Backend: Spring Boot, Node.js
Cloud & Containerization: AWS (Lambda, S3, EC2), Azure, Docker

experience.description: Developed a full-stack web application using Spring Boot (Java), Angular, and MySQL, deployed on Microsoft Azure. Contributed to building scalable backend services, integrating frontend features, and ensuring reliable cloud deployment.

Contributed to writing unit and integration test cases using JUnit and Mockito, and helped develop a serverless application with AWS Lambda and Java. Strengthened understanding of cloud-based backend development and test-driven design.

projects.title: Federated ECG Anomaly Detection Using CNNs
projects.description: Developed a federated learning framework enabling hospitals to collaboratively train a CNN model on the MIT-BIH Arrhythmia dataset without sharing raw data. Enhanced anomaly detection accuracy while preserving privacy and data compliance.

projects.title: Finance Tracker
projects.description: Built a full-stack finance management platform with a Spring Boot backend and PostgreSQL database to automate portfolio tracking, analyze expenses, and provide real-time financial insights. Integrated React frontend for seamless user experience.

projects.title: QuantScope
projects.description: Designed an AI-powered global market analysis tool combining LangChain and GenAI to generate insights on stocks and macro trends. Implemented interactive charts, real-time data visualization, and technical indicators for investors.

projects.title: TaskHive: Smart Task Management System
projects.description: A modern task management app combining a Spring Boot backend with an Angular frontend. Features light/dark themes, intuitive UI, and command-line style interactions for advanced users. Designed to boost productivity and usability.

volunteer.description: Help to connect with students and Student branches, organizing impactful events to bridge the gap between academia and industry. Foster collaboration and knowledge sharing within the IEEE community.

Facilitated collaboration and membership growth among student branches through meetups and initiatives. Revived dormant branches and organized subsection-wide events, fostering communication and leadership.
Managed finances and supported 90+ events, enhancing operations and member engagement. Strengthened branch visibility and streamlined resource allocation effectively.
